name: Heroes of Legend: Castle Defense
description:
Heroes of Legend (HOL) - The war between the Heroes and the beasts. This is another interesting defense game.
Heroes of Legend is a strategy game, play in the role of defender and attacker: you need to protect your castle and send your troops to destroy the Orcs' base.
Key Features:
- FREE TO PLAY
- Combination of Age of Empires ( AOE ) and Tower defense: upgrade Age, castle defense and troop system, build mines, ...
- Variety of troops like clubman, bowman, sword man, scout, cavalry, horse archer, ballista …
- 20+ monsters of different types
- Tons of levels and maps
- 3 different game play modes
- Powerful magic: fire, ice and sacred and variety of game items to improve the HP of your base, mines and troops
- Collect coins to purchase potent power-ups
- Boss fight
- Polished graphics and glorious magic effects
